items.sentence: Tom asked me why I didn't hang out with him as much as I used to.
My head's still pounding, but I don't have a temperature anymore.
You're the only one who wants to go home early today, aren't you?
You're the only person in the office who can do that, aren't you?
The police suspect that Tom was the one who set the barn on fire.
The only time Tom gets to spend with his children is on weekends.
How many hours a day does the average Canadian spend watching TV?
The family that Tom is staying with doesn't live near a bus stop.
Tom will never forgive Mary for the trick that she played on him.
Personally, I think that corporal punishment is a necessary evil.
